title: Summoner’s Crown Capsule [Skin Issue]
body:
Hi, I just added the Summoner’s Crown Capsule from Twitch prime and unlocked a skin, "Beast Hunter Draven".

I don't own this champion, and the skin still says it is locked. If I were to purchase Draven would I then gain access to the skin, without additional purchase or have I been gipped?

Thanks.
